QuestData.Title: Help Those That Cannot Help Themselves
QuestData.Description: They're majestic beasts, aren't they?$B$B<Lathorius points towards the mammoths of the northern tundra.>$B$BWith each passing day their numbers diminish. Demons that call themselves hunters slay the beasts for sport and riches.$B$B<Lathorius' face contorts with anger.>$B$BIt's the whimpers that drive me to madness, $n. You can hear them, carried by the wind. The mammoth calves, trapped in the hunters' vile traps, call out to us.$B$BTake this hammer and smash those traps. Free the calves!
QuestData.LogDescription: Arch Druid Lathorius at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in the Borean Tundra wants you to use the D.E.H.T.A. Trap Smasher to free 8 Mammoth Calves.
QuestData.RewardText: <Arch Druid Lathorius wipes away his tears.>$B$BThey never stood a chance. Now orphaned, they will surely die on their own.
